name: GDrive-Mirror-Bot
description: This is a telegram bot written in python for mirroring files on the internet to our beloved Google Drive

ENV.description: Set it to anything to enable configuration by environment variables.

APP_ID.description: Your API_ID, Get it from https://my.telegram.org/apps

API_HASH.description: Your API_HASH, Get it from https://my.telegram.org/apps

AUTH_CHATS.description: Chat ID's which you wanted to Authorize

AUTO_DELETE_MESSAGE_DURATION.description: Interval of time (in second's), after which the bot deletes it's message (and command message) which is expected to be viewed instantly Note set to -1 to never automatically delete message

DOWNLOAD_STATUS_UPDATE_INTERVAL.description: A short interval of time in seconds after which the mirror progress message is updated (I recommand to keep it 5  seconds at least

GDRIVE_FOLDER_ID.description: This is the Folder ID of The Google Drive folder to which you want to upload all the mirrors
